sourcesContent:
// import images from all-images/blog-img directory
import img01 from "../all-images/blog-img/blog-1.jpeg";
import img02 from "../all-images/blog-img/blog-2.jpeg";
import img03 from "../all-images/blog-img/blog-3.jpeg";
import img04 from "../all-images/blog-img/blog-4.jpg";
import img05 from "../all-images/blog-img/blog-3.jpg";
import img06 from "../all-images/blog-img/blog-3.jpg";

const blogData = [
  {
    id: 1,
    title: "Convenience and Accessibility",
    author: "Aryan",
    date: "12 Dec, 2020",
    time: "9pm",
    imgUrl: img01,
    description:
      "One of the primary benefits of renting a scooter or bike online is the convenience it offers. With just a few clicks, you can rent a vehicle from the comfort of your home or office. You don't have to waste time visiting a rental shop or waiting in long queues. Additionally, online rental platforms operate 24/7, so you can rent a vehicle at any time that's convenient for you.",
    quote:
      "Renting a scooter or bike online saves you time and hassle, giving you the freedom to travel on your terms.",
  },

  {
    id: 2,
    title: "Cost-Effective",
    author: "Harshit",
    date: "12 Dec, 2020",
    time: "9pm",
    imgUrl: img02,
    description:
      " Renting a scooter or bike online is more cost-effective than buying one. When you rent a vehicle, you only pay for the time you use it, so you don't have to worry about maintenance, insurance, or other hidden costs associated with owning a vehicle. Plus, many online rental platforms offer competitive rates and discounts for long-term rentals, making it an affordable transportation option for everyone.",
    quote:
      "Renting a scooter or bike online is a cost-effective alternative to owning a vehicle, without sacrificing convenience or reliability.",
  },

  {
    id: 3,
    title: "Eco-Friendly",
    author: "Kaustubh",
    date: "12 Dec, 2020",
    time: "9pm",
    imgUrl: img03,
    description:
      " Renting a scooter or bike online is an eco-friendly option that reduces your carbon footprint. Unlike cars, scooters and bikes produce fewer emissions, making them a sustainable alternative for short-distance travel. Additionally, online rental platforms often use electric or hybrid vehicles, further reducing their environmental impact",
    quote:
      "Renting a scooter or bike online is not only good for your wallet, but also for the environment. It's a sustainable transportation option that reduces your carbon footprint",
  },
  {
    id: 4,
    title: "Flexibility",
    author: "Kaustubh",
    date: "12 Dec, 2020",
    time: "9pm",
    imgUrl: img04,
    description:
      " Renting a scooter or bike online gives you the freedom to travel on your terms. You can rent a vehicle for as long as you need, whether it's a few hours or several days. Plus, you can choose from a variety of vehicles, including scooters, bikes, and e-bikes, depending on your preferences and needs. This flexibility allows you to plan your trip the way you want and explore your destination at your own pace",
    quote:
      "Renting a scooter or bike online gives you the flexibility to explore your destination at your own pace, without being tied to public transportation schedules or the expense of owning a vehicle.",
  },
  {
    id: 5,
    title: "Safety",
    author: "Kaustubh",
    date: "12 Dec, 2020",
    time: "9pm",
    imgUrl: img05,
    description:
      " Online rental platforms prioritize safety and ensure that all vehicles are well-maintained and regularly serviced. Many platforms also provide helmets and other safety gear to ensure that riders are protected while on the road. Additionally, most platforms require users to provide a valid driver's license and follow traffic rules and regulations, further ensuring the safety of riders.",
    quote:
      "Online rental platforms prioritize safety and provide riders with well-maintained vehicles and safety gear, ensuring a secure and enjoyable ride.",
  },
];

export default blogData;
